name: Square Heroes 1.6 Demo
description:
Square Heroes is a comical arena shooter featuring local and online multiplayer including Co-op, PvP and team based modes, with an arsenal of weapons to blast your friends out of the sky!

Hone your skills and level-up your character in the single-player Tournament, or skip straight to the main event and challenge your friends in one of the hilarious and frantic online skirmish modes.

Square Heroes Demo players are able to create and jump into online matches, include cross-platform play with PlayStation® 4!
